The app complements the existing mAadhaar app, which handles document downloads and card orders. This digital solution offers enhanced privacy and convenience for everyday identity verification.

description: Thailand has suspended its Malaysia-brokered peace deal with Cambodia following a landmine explosion that injured two Thai soldiers near their shared border. Prime Minister Anutin Charnvirakul cited the incident as proof of ongoing hostility, halting disarmament and border demilitarisation efforts. The suspension includes the release of detained Cambodian soldiers, as Thailand plans to file a formal complaint with regional observers.

title: Pak hockey in turmoil! Head coach pulls out of Bangladesh tour; PHF eyes replacement
description: Pakistan's hockey coach, Tahir Zaman, has refused to travel for the Bangladesh series, citing PHF interference in player selection. He objected to late additions to the squad, emphasising the need for the coach's final say for team improvement. The team manager will oversee coaching duties in Dhaka, with foreign coaches a potential future option.

This gang targeted families through fraudulent marriages.
